abstract: There is a reason candidates court big donors: The net share of their donations is far greater than from low-dollar donors.
snippet: There is a reason candidates court big donors: The net share of their donations is far greater than from low-dollar donors.
lead_paragraph: There is a reason candidates court big donors. Yes, they have more money. But more important, the net share of their donations is far greater than from low-dollar donors.

headline.main: Bachmann's Lack of Big Donors Could Hinder Campaign
